name: BedLink
0:
”Alexa tell bed control lower the bed down two”
”Alexa tell bed control lower my feet down five”
”Alexa tell bed control raise my head up three”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bed control
Developer Terms of Use
des: You will require a Oratell BedLink device configured for your bed. Go to Oratell.com to see the large number of Beds that BedLink can control. Please note that the BedLink Universal can be configured to control virtually any power bed. IMPORTANT: To use Oratell BedLink you must register your device. Please click on the (Developer Private Policy) link below to register your device. you can find your device ID and password on the bottom of the BedLink unit. The device ID and password are case sensitive.
